I.name: Mortal Will
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Pantheon''' generates a [[stack]] of ''Mortal Will'' whenever he lands a [[basic attack]] {{tip|on-hit}} or casts an [[ability]], stacking up to a maximum of 5. At 5 stacks, '''Pantheon's''' next basic ability consumes the stacks to become empowered with an additional effect.
'''Pantheon''' gains maximum stacks of ''Mortal Will'' upon starting the game, completing a {{si|Recall}} channel, and [[death|respawning]].
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Pantheon generates a stack of Mortal Will whenever he lands a basic attack on-hit or casts an ability, stacking up to a maximum of 5. At 5 stacks, Pantheon's next basic ability consumes the stacks to become empowered with an additional effect.
Pantheon gains maximum stacks of Mortal Will upon starting the game, completing a Recall channel, and death.

Q.name: Comet Spear
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' {{tip|channel|charges}} while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 10% for up to 4 seconds to increase ''Comet Spear's'' {{sti|range}} after {{fd|0.35}} seconds of channeling. ''Comet Spear'' can be recast within the duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Pantheon''' hurls his spear in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit, {{ccs|increased|physical}} against enemies {{as|below 20% of their '''maximum''' health}} but reduced by 50% against enemies beyond the first. Total damage is reduced by 30% against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.

Releasing the ability within {{fd|0.35}} seconds causes '''Pantheon''' to instead thrust his spear in the target direction, dealing the same {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit and {{sti|cdr|refunding}} 60% of ''Comet Spear's'' cooldown. The thrust's damage is not reduced against enemies beyond the first.

If the charge is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} or completes without reactivation, ''Comet Spear'' is cancelled and the ability is put on {{sti|cd|full}} cooldown but refunds {{sti|mana|{{as|half the mana cost}}}}.

{{sbc|{{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}:}} ''Comet Spear'' gains {{as|{{pp|20 to 240}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 115% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, affected by the previous damage reductions. Consumes the stacks upon recasting.
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Pantheon charges while being slowed by 10% for up to 4 seconds to increase Comet Spear's range after 0.35 seconds of channeling. Comet Spear can be recast within the duration.
Recast: Pantheon hurls his spear in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit, Unknown value: ccs / increased / physical against enemies below 20% of their maximum health but reduced by 50% against enemies beyond the first. Total damage is reduced by 30% against minions and monsters.
Releasing the ability within 0.35 seconds causes Pantheon to instead thrust his spear in the target direction, dealing the same physical damage to enemies hit and refunding 60% of Comet Spear's cooldown. The thrust's damage is not reduced against enemies beyond the first.
If the charge is interrupted or completes without reactivation, Comet Spear is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but refunds half the mana cost.
Pantheon's Mortal Will: Comet Spear gains 20 âˆ’ 240 (based on level) (+ 115% bonus AD) bonus physical damage, affected by the previous damage reductions. Consumes the stacks upon recasting.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|70 to 190}} {{as|(+ 115% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Increased Damage|{{ap|155 to 455}} {{as|(+ 230% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Secondary Physical Damage|{{ap|70*0.5 to 190*0.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|115*0.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Increased Secondary Damage|{{ap|155*0.5 to 455*0.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|230*0.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 115% bonus AD)
  • Increased Damage: (+ 230% bonus AD)
  • Secondary Physical Damage: (+ % bonus AD)
  • Increased Secondary Damage: (+ % bonus AD)

W.name: Shield Vault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} to the front of the target enemy's location and, if the target is within 800 units upon arrival, he deals {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|stun|stuns}} them for 1 second.

{{sbc|{{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}:}} '''Pantheon's''' next basic attack within 4 seconds has a cast time and strikes the target 3 times over a brief period, dealing {{as|{{pp|120/3 to 165/3|key=%}} AD}} {{as|physical damage}} per hit, up to {{as|{{pp|120 to 165|key=%}} AD}}. Each hit is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers and applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectiveness.
''Empowered Shield Vault'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Pantheon's''' basic attack timer.
'''''Pantheon''' will attempt to basic attack the target at the end of the leap.''
W.descriptionHtml:
Active: Pantheon leaps to the front of the target enemy's location and, if the target is within 800 units upon arrival, he deals physical damage and stuns them for 1 second.
Pantheon's Mortal Will: Pantheon's next basic attack within 4 seconds has a cast time and strikes the target 3 times over a brief period, dealing 120/3% âˆ’ 165/3% (based on level) AD physical damage per hit, up to 120% âˆ’ 165% (based on level) AD. Each hit is affected by critical strike modifiers and applies on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
Empowered Shield Vault resets Pantheon's basic attack timer.
Pantheon will attempt to basic attack the target at the end of the leap.
W.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} on the initial vault. Deals {{tip|default damage}} on the additional attacks from the empowered ability.
* Despite the multi-hit attack only having a hidden {{fd|0.375}}-second cast time, '''Pantheon''' will remain {{tip|lockout|unable to act}} until the last strike has been dealt.
** The empowered attack's total time is affected by '''Pantheon's''' {{stil|attack speed}}.
** {{pending for test}} The attack's total time is the cast time plus '''Pantheon's''' attack windup time.
* The 3 strikes that occurs after ''Empowered Shield Vault'' each apply a stack of {{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}, even if the attacks are {{tip|dodged}}, {{tip|blocked}}, or missed while '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* The empowered attack will not trigger against [[structures]].

E.name: Aegis Assault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' braces his shield in the target direction and {{tip|channel|channels}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, during which he becomes {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}} against non-{{tip|turret}} damage dealt by enemies from the target direction. He also continually performs strikes in a cone in front of him, dealing {{as|{{fd|8.{{recurring|3}}}}% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} every {{fd|0.125}} seconds to enemies hit, reduced by 50% against {{tip|minions}} and up to {{as|100% AD}} {{as|'''total''' physical damage}} against each target.
''Aegis Assault'' can be recast after {{fd|0.3}} seconds, and does so automatically after the duration. ''Aegis Assault's'' channel cannot be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by {{tip|crowd control}}.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Pantheon''' slams with his shield in a cone in front of him, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit.
{{sbc|{{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}:}} '''Pantheon''' gains {{sti|{{as|60% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds after recasting.
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Pantheon braces his shield in the target direction and channels for 1.5 seconds, during which he becomes invulnerable against non-turret damage dealt by enemies from the target direction. He also continually performs strikes in a cone in front of him, dealing 8.Unknown value: recurring / 3% AD physical damage every 0.125 seconds to enemies hit, reduced by 50% against minions and up to 100% AD total physical damage against each target.
Aegis Assault can be recast after 0.3 seconds, and does so automatically after the duration. Aegis Assault's channel cannot be interrupted by crowd control.
Recast: Pantheon slams with his shield in a cone in front of him, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.
Pantheon's Mortal Will: Pantheon gains 60% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds after recasting.
E.notes:
*The initial cast count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**Detonating the ability manually is not.
* '''Pantheon''' retains his {{tip|invulnerable|invulnerability}} during the recast's cast time.
{{Effect at cast time start}}
** '''Pantheon''' will slam from wherever he was at the start of the recast's' cast time.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the slam's damage.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|move=true|cast=false|items=true,,, false|spells=true, true, true, false, false|interrupts=death}}

R.name: Grand Starfall
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Pantheon''' gains {{sti|{{as|armor penetration}}}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' {{tip|channel|channels}} for 2 seconds, then leaps high into the air, {{tip|vanish|vanishing}} and becoming {{tip|cc-immune|immune to crowd control}} until he reappears. While in the air, '''Pantheon''' {{tip|channel|channels}} again for {{fd|2.2}} seconds and grants {{tip|sight}} around the target location {{fd|0.5}} seconds into the channel.

After {{tt|{{fd|0.8}}|Estimated}} seconds into the channel, '''Pantheon''' prepares for landing by hurling his spear to the target location over {{tt|{{fd|0.2}}|Estimated}} seconds that deals {{as|{{pp|type=[[File:Comet Spear.png|20px|border]] Comet Spear's rank|40 to 190 for 6|0 to 5}} {{as|(+ 115% '''bonus''' AD)}} physical damage|physical damage}} to enemies near its landing point and {{tip|slows}} them by 50% for 2 seconds.

Over the remaining {{tt|{{fd|1.2}}|Estimated}} seconds, '''Pantheon''' crashes down and creates a shockwave alongside himself that travels toward the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit, decreased by up to 50% for those hit at the edge of the area. Upon completion of the channel, '''Pantheon''' {{tip|blink|reappears}} at the target location and gains full stacks of {{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}.
''Grand Starfall'' is put on a {{sti|cd|30-second}} cooldown if the first channel is canceled.
R.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Pantheon gains armor penetration.
Active: Pantheon channels for 2 seconds, then leaps high into the air, vanishing and becoming immune to crowd control until he reappears. While in the air, Pantheon channels again for 2.2 seconds and grants sight around the target location 0.5 seconds into the channel.
After 0.8 seconds into the channel, Pantheon prepares for landing by hurling his spear to the target location over 0.2 seconds that deals 0 to 5 â€’ undefined (+ 115% bonus AD) physical damage to enemies near its landing point and slows them by 50% for 2 seconds.
Over the remaining 1.2 seconds, Pantheon crashes down and creates a shockwave alongside himself that travels toward the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies hit, decreased by up to 50% for those hit at the edge of the area. Upon completion of the channel, Pantheon reappears at the target location and gains full stacks of Pantheon's Mortal Will.
Grand Starfall is put on a 30-second cooldown if the first channel is canceled.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|300 to 700}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Minimum Damage|{{ap|300/2 to 700/2}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
R.notes:
* The spear's damage is not empowered by {{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}, nor increased against enemies below {{as|20% of their '''maximum''' health}}.
* During the second channel, '''Pantheon''' gains a {{tip|minimum health threshold}} of 1.
** '''Pantheon''' will instantly die upon reappearing if he reaches this threshold.
* Abilities that target '''Pantheon''' will redirect to the last location.
* [[Ping|Pinging]] the ability will inform allies in [[Hotkeys and commands|chat]] which {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champions are in range of ''Grand Starfall''.
* '''Pantheon''' is considered to be in his original casting position even after leaping, but he will {{tip|blink}} to the target location the moment the second channel completes.
* Using ''Grand Starfall'' will inform allies with a ping.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}} (first channel):
{{ct|channel|items=false|spells=false|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|consume=false|interrupts=death, ground, root, silence}}
* The cast time and second channel have the same interactions except they can only be interrupted by {{tip|death}}.
* ''Grand Starfall's'' first channel will also be interrupted if he enters the {{ai|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}}.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 100% AP)
  • Minimum Damage: (+ 50% AP)
